What preparation is needed for this Chec: Fasting is required for about 10 - 12 hours before the sample collection. Consumption of water is permitted.
Who should book this checkup?: Bone and joint problems that are manifested in the form of aches, pains and tightness or stiffness restrict our mobility in everyday life. The incidence of these problems is increasing in the young Indian population due to obesity, lack of exercise and nutritional deficiencies. The advance bone and joint checkup will help you screen for conditions such as calcium and vitamin deficiencies and arthritis, which are common causes of bone and joint problemsIncludes 11 TestVitamin Profile2 testsVitamin D 25-Oh BloodVitamin B12 Conventional BloodAlkaline Phosphatase BloodCalcium Ion Specific Electrode Potentiometric Method BloodParathyroid Hormone BloodMagnesium BloodPhosphorus Automated BloodRheumatoid Arthritis Factor Automated BloodCopper Blood SerumZinc BloodUric Acid Automated BloodHow it works?Pick a package that suits your healthcare needs and seamlessly book a home sample collection|We will send a certified professional to your place to assist you with the sample collection|After your sample collection, you can access your reports within your account on our mobile application.
